FallbackTrigger.Name: Fallback Trigger
FallbackTrigger.Hint: The text that triggers the character's dice pool to decrement. If not specified, defaults to 'action die'.

FallbackBonusTrigger.Name: Fallback Bonus Trigger
FallbackBonusTrigger.Hint: The text that triggers the character's bonus dice pool to decrement if there is one. If not specified, defaults to '+b'.

BonusPoolSuffix.Name: Bonus Pool Suffix
BonusPoolSuffix.Hint: The suffix denoting a pool to be a bonus pool; defaults to 'bonus'.

DieExplodes.Name: Die Explodes
DieExplodes.Hint: The pool can explode when the rolled number is the maximum possible.

Trigger.Name: Trigger
Trigger.Hint: The text that triggers the character's dice pool to decrement.  If not specified, defaults to GM-set text..

BonusTrigger.Name: Bonus
BonusTrigger.Hint: The text that triggers the Bonus dice pool to decrement, if there is one.  If not specified, defaults to GM-set text..

AddPoolDice.Name: Add Pool Dice
AddPoolDice.Hint: Add the pool's dice when clicking the 'AD' or 'B' buttons.
